scripts.migrate: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config "src/config/config.js" --env "production"
scripts.migrate:undo: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --config "src/config/config.js" --env "production"
scripts.seed: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config "src/config/config.js" --env "production"
scripts.migrate:undo:all: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --config "src/config/config.js" --env "production"
scripts.migrate:seed: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config "src/config/config.js" --env "production" && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config "src/config/config.js" --env "production"
scripts.migrate:undo:seed: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --config "src/config/config.js" --env "production" &&  db:migrate --config "src/config/config.js" --env "production"
